document.full_text: jordan's islamist opposition said on tuesday it would not join a government-appointed panel to discuss political reform because its remit did not include constitutional change to curb the monarch's powers.
document.title: jordan panel to push reforms angers opposition
lines_and_colors: jordan's islamist opposition said on tuesday it would not join a government-appointed panel to discuss political reform because its remit did not include constitutional change to curb the monarch's powers.
